# Super Bowl LX is nearly here, with the Seattle Seahawks taking on the New England Patriots. While Bad Bunny will be the star of the halftime show, AI could be the star of the commercial breaks, much like crypto was a few years ago. ## Conclusion
The real impact of this shift depends on how responsibly and thoughtfully the technology is adopted.
